channel.title: Help with Action Handler
channel.description: Okay I addressed this problem before and got some help but it didnt solve the issue. I am making a minigame wher you need to kill certain npc's to move on and at the end you click something and get 100m gp. (the npc's have had changes with hp and lvls) But my issue is I can just click the portals and move on with out killing the npc's. I tried one code someone gave me but it didn't work so I modified it a bit and got less errors but still didnt fix the problem. Any help would be great . [img]http://i.imgur.com/wUkNk.png[/img]

item.title: Help with Action Handler
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

you don’t have the hasKilled method in your client class

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Action Handler
item.dc:creator: @alltimenewb alltimenewb
item.description:
@alltimenewb wrote:

Okay I addressed this problem before and got some help but it didnt solve the issue. I am making a minigame wher you need to kill certain npc’s to move on and at the end you click something and get 100m gp. (the npc’s have had changes with hp and lvls)
But my issue is I can just click the portals and move on with out killing the npc’s. I tried one code someone gave me but it didn’t work so I modified it a bit and got less errors but still didnt fix the problem. Any help would be great .
